ART_ATTENDANCE_IMPOSSIBLE: ART attendance model can only be estimated if ART programme data are used.
TIME_VARYING_ART_ATTENDANCE_IMPOSSIBLE: Time-varying ART attendance can only be estimated if ART programme data are used at both Time 1 and Time 2.
NO_COUNTRY_LEVEL_FIT: Cannot fit model at country level. Choose a different level.
MISSING_ART_DATA: ART dataset not provided. ART data cannot be selected Yes to include.
AREAS_AREA_LEVEL_HIERARCHY_BOUNDARIES_MI: Either supply levels, hierarchy, and boundaries, or area_merged
AREAS_LEVEL_NOT_UNIQUE:
Area levels not unique.
Duplicated level: {{missing_levels}}
INDICATOR_LABEL_PREVALENCE: Proportion of total population HIV positive
INDICATOR_LABEL_PLHIV: Number of people living with HIV
INDICATOR_LABEL_INFECTIONS: Number of new infections per year
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_ART_COVERAGE: ART coverage among ANC attendees prior to first ANC
NO_ART_DATA_FOR_QUARTER:
No ART data found for quarter {{calendar_quarter}}.
Set 'Include ART data' to 'No' if you intend to include no ART data.
ANC_ON_ART_GREATER_THAN_TOTAL_POSITIVE: ANC testing on ART greater than ANC testing total positive.
ANC_DATA_MISSING_FOR_YEAR: ANC testing data not found for year {{missing_year}}.
ANC_DATA_MISSING_FOR_YEAR_PLURAL: ANC testing data not found for years {{missing_year}}.
ANC_POSITIVE_GREATER_TOTAL_KNOWN: Number of HIV positive ANC attendees (numerator) is greater than number of ANC attendees with an HIV status outcome (denominator).
ART_COV_AND_VLS_SAME_SURVEY: Do not use ART coverage and VLS data from the same survey: {{survey_ids}}
ART_COV_AND_VLS_SAME_SURVEY_PLURAL: Do not use ART coverage and VLS data from the same surveys: {{survey_ids}}
PJNZ_SHAPE_CODE_MISMATCH: Some spectrum region code in your shape file are not in PJNZ extracts. Please update your shape file to include the correct codes
SCOPE_AREAS_MISSING_HIERARCHY: Scope area {{missing_areas}} not found in hierarchy.
SCOPE_AREAS_MISSING_HIERARCHY_PLURAL: Scope areas {{missing_areas}} not found in hierarchy.
SHAPE_SPECTRUM_REGION_ALL_NA: Spectrum region code column is all missing in your shape file. Update the shape file with Spectrum region code for the estimation level.
OLD_MODEL_OUTPUT: Model output out of date please re-run model and try again.
MISSING_CALIBRATION_OPTIONS: Calibration cannot be run, missing options for {{missing}}
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_PLHIV: Number of HIV positive women attending ANC
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_ALREADY_ART: Number already on ART prior prior to first ANC visit
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_ART_NEW: Number of pregnant women initiated on ART at ANC
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_KNOWN_POS: Number of HIV positive ANC attendees aware of status prior to first ANC visit
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_TESTED_POS: Number of HIV positive ANC attendees tested at ANC
INDICATOR_LABEL_ANC_TESTED_NEG: Number of HIV negative ANC attendees tested at ANC
INDICATOR_LABEL_UNTREATED_PLHIV_NUM: Number of PLHIV not on ART
INDICATOR_LABEL_AWARE_PLHIV_PROP: Proportion of PLHIV aware of HIV positive status
INDICATOR_LABEL_UNAWARE_PLHIV_NUM: Number PLHIV unaware of HIV positive status
ERROR_SHINY90_MISSING_1: .shiny90 file is not present for the following projection(s)
ERROR_SHINY90_MISSING_2: Reload PJNZ with .shiny90 included or set Advanced option 'Output awareness of HIV status indicators' to "No".
EXTRACT_INDICATORS_SIMULATE_ERROR: Error simulating output for indicator: {{varname}}. Please contact support for troubleshooting.
INVALID_DOWNLOAD: Can't prepare download, please re-calibrate model and try again
FAILED_VERSION_MIGRATE: Can't migrate model output from version {{old}} to {{new}}
PREVALENCE_SURVEY_PREFIX: National household survey data on HIV prevalence from
ART_SURVEY_PREFIX: National household survey data on ART coverage from
INFECTIONS_SURVEY_PREFIX: National household survey data on new HIV infections from
CANNOT_RECALIBRATE: Calibration cannot be re-run for this model fit please re-run fit step.
INVALID_ART_TIME_PERIOD: Quarterly data not provided for all disaggregates or duplicate annual data provided for all disaggregates.
ART_TOTAL_DESC: Number on ART at the end of calendar year
ART_ADULT_F_DESC: Number of women (15+) on ART at the end of calendar year
ART_ADULT_M_DESC: Number of men (15+) on ART at the end of calendar year
ART_ADULT_DESC: Number of adults (15+) on ART at the end of calendar year
ART_CHILD_DESC: Number of children (<15) on ART at the end of calendar year
ART_ADULT_SEX_RATIO_DESC: Ratio of females-to-males among adults on ART
ART_ADULT_CHILD_RATIO_DESC: Ratio of females-to-males among children (<15) on ART
ART_PROP_U15_DESC: Proportion of total on-ART under age 15
ANC_ART_COVERAGE_DESC: Total ART coverage prior to first ANC visit
ANC_KNOWN_POS_DESC: Number of HIV positive ANC attendees aware of status prior to first ANC visit
ANC_TESTED_DESC: Total number of ANC attendees tested
ANC_TESTED_POS_DESC: Number of HIV positive ANC attendees tested at ANC v
ART_NEW_ADULT_F_DESC: Number of women (15+) initiated on ART
ART_NEW_ADULT_M_DESC: Number of men (15+) initiated on ART
ART_NEW_ADULT_DESC: Number of adults (15+) initiated on ART
ART_NEW_CHILD_DESC: Number of children (<15) initiated on ART
VL_COVERAGE_TOTAL_DESC: Ratio of VL tests to number on ART
VL_COVERAGE_ADULT_F_DESC: Ratio of VL tests to number on ART (women 15+)
VL_COVERAGE_ADULT_M_DESC: Ratio of VL tests to number on ART (men 15+)
VL_COVERAGE_ADULT_DESC: Ratio of VL tests to number on ART (adults 15+)
VL_COVERAGE_CHILD_DESC: Ratio of VL tests to number on ART (children <15)
INVALID_CALIBRATE_OBJECT: Cannot get calibration plot, output does not contain calibration data
WARNING_OPTIONS_MISSING_ARTATTEND: You have chosen to fit model without estimating neighbouring ART attendance. You may wish to review your selection to include this option.
WARNING_OUTPUTS_PREV_EXCEEDS_THRESHOLD: HIV prevalence is higher than 50% for: {{rows}}
WARNING_OUTPUTS_ARTCOV_EXCEEDS_THRESHOLD: ART coverage is higher than 100% for: {{rows}}
NAVIGATOR_ART_IS_SPECTRUM_DESC: Naomi number on ART 2015 to present is Spectrum national total on ART
NAVIGATOR_ANC_IS_SPECTRUM_DESC: Naomi num ANC clients 2015 to present is Spectrum ANC testing cascade
NAVIGATOR_PACKAGE_HAS_ALL_DATA_DESC: Naomi package has all data from upload or ADR
NAVIGATOR_OPT_RECENT_QTR_DESC: Model Options - Most recent calendar quarter selected
NAVIGATOR_OPT_FUTURE_PROJ_QTR_DESC: Model Options - Future projection quarter selected
NAVIGATOR_OPT_CALENDAR_SURVEY_MATCH_DESC: Model Options - T1 calendar quarter matches one survey
NAVIGATOR_OPT_RECENT_SURVEY_ONLY_DESC: Model Options - Only most recent survey included (also TRUE for known special cases)
NAVIGATOR_OPT_ART_COVERAGE_DESC: Model Options - ART coverage included if availble
NAVIGATOR_OPT_ANC_DATA_DESC: Model Options - ANC data included if avaialble
NAVIGATOR_OPT_ART_DATA_DESC: Model Options - ART data included if available
NAVIGATOR_CAL_POPULATION_DESC: Calibration - Spectrum Population national (subnational if Spectrum subnational)
NAVIGATOR_CAL_PLHIV_DESC: Calibration - Spectrum PLHIV national (subnational if Spectrum subnational)
NAVIGATOR_CAL_ART_DESC: Calibration - Spectrum ART national (subnational if Spectrum subnational)
NAVIGATOR_CAL_KOS_DESC: Calibration - Spectrum KOS national (subnational if Spectrum subnational)
NAVIGATOR_CAL_NEW_INFECTIONS_DESC: Calibration - Spectrum new infections national (subnational if Spectrum subnational)
WARNING_ART_NOT_EQUAL_TO_SPECTRUM: Naomi ART current not equal to Spectrum: {{warnings}}
WARNING_ANC_TEST_NOT_EQUAL_TO_SPECTRUM: Naomi ANC testing not equal to Spectrum: {{warnings}}
WARNING_ANC_TEST_POS_NOT_EQUAL_TO_SPECTR: Naomi ANC tested positive not equal to Spectrum: {{warnings}}
INDICATOR_LABEL_PLHIV_ATTEND: Number of PLHIV in area ART catchment
INDICATOR_LABEL_UNTREATED_PLHIV_ATTEND: Number of untreated PLHIV in area ART catchment
WARNING_NO_UNCERTAINTY: Unable to generate uncertainty bounds for model estimates. Mode reported in place of mean. Please review model inputs and model options.
CALIBRATION_ERROR_INVALID_MODE_VALUES: Unable to calibrate model outputs due to invalid mode estimates
